EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Spring Days New York Speaker Sponsor Social_Q217.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the Spring Days NY Speaker | Sponsor Social
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Spring Days NY Speaker | Sponsor Social at Roof at Park South on June 19th.
Date: Monday, June 19, 2017
Time:
6:00PM to 8:00PM
Location: Roof at Park South 125 E. 27th Street (Between Park & Lexington) New York, NY 10016 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Real+Office+Centers,+Santa+Monica/@34.0193967,-118.4945013,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:https://www.google.com/maps/place/Roof+at+Park+South/@40.7424192,-73.9833872,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x3d1d7e6a809b45a6!8m2!3d40.7424192!4d-73.9833872!8m2!3d34.0193967!4d-118.4945013]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Tasha Isenberg at tisenberg@pivotal.io <[[mailto:tisenberg@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team Event Details <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Spring-Days-New-York-Speaker-Sponsor-Social.html]]>
